events.title: Establishment of the State of Israel
events.description: David Ben-Gurion proclaimed the establishment of the State of Israel.

events.title: The Six-Day War
events.description: Israel fought against Egypt, Jordan, and Syria, significantly altering the political landscape of the Middle East.

events.title: Peace Treaty with Egypt
events.description: Israel and Egypt signed a peace treaty, the first between Israel and an Arab country.

events.title: Oslo Accords
events.description: The Oslo Accords were signed between Israel and the PLO, aiming to resolve the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.

events.title: Operation Entebbe
events.description: Israeli commandos rescued hostages from a hijacked Air France flight at Entebbe Airport.
